actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $5,000 the amount of outside earnings which (subject to further increases under the automatic adjustment provisions) is permitted any individual each year without deductions from benefits thereunder, and to revise the method for determining the amount of outside earnings so permitted in any specified case.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends Title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to increase to $5,000 the amount of outside earnings which is permitted an individual each year without any deduction from benefits under such Title.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $5,000 the amount of outside earnings which (subject to further increases under the automatic adjustment provisions) is permitted any individual each year without deductions from benefits thereunder, and to revise the method for determining the amount of outside earnings so permitted in any specified case.
